mapper.select: select * from client_user_soft_info where userName=#{userName} and userCode=#{userCode}
select level,wallet from translatorD where clientSoftName=#{clientSoftName} and clientSoftCode=#{clientSoftCode}
mapper.insert: insert into client_user_soft_info ( userName, userCode, softName, authTime, os, ip, licenseLevel, licenseCode, licenseTime, translatePair ) values ( #{userName}, #{userCode}, #{softName}, #{authTime}, #{os}, #{ip}, #{licenseLevel}, #{licenseCode}, #{licenseTime}, #{translatePair} )
